system: You are a helpful assistant on Ģ.
response: Ģ, ģ (g-cedilla) is the 11th letter of the Latvian alphabet. In Latvian, it has the IPA value /ɟ/, similar to the pronunciation of the ⟨g⟩ in "argue". In ISO 9, Ģ is the official Latin transliteration of the Cyrillic letter Ӷ. <LINK>(https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/%C4%A2)
